spiritsExplanation:
The workout "Instructional: Hip Pivot" is primarily characterized by its instructional and technique-focused nature, as depicted in the title and description emphasizing learning to build power through the hip pivot. This aligns with the "Structured & Disciplined" spirit, as it suggests a methodical approach to training, earning it a high score of 0.8.

The inclusion of a warm-up in the metadata and the smooth, music-driven elements (evidenced by the playlist and the chosen song "Higher" by Creed) introduce elements of "Flow & Rhythm." The music helps establish a coordination between movement and rhythm, supporting a moderate score of 0.5.

The workout image shows an outdoor setting, slightly suggesting an "Outdoor & Adventure" context. However, since the main focus is on technical skill in an instructional format, the "Outdoor & Adventure" spirit is less pronounced, warranting a low score of 0.2.
